body.name: Phone Tripod 55", ENGiNDOT Extendable Aluminum Camera Tripod, W/Phone Holder and Remote Shutter, Compatible with iPhone/Android, Perfect for Selfies/Vlog/Live Stream/TikTok
features: 【Adjustable & Portable】Comes with 3-section aluminum alloy legs & quick-release flip-locks, which can extend from 16" to 55" to meet your needs of different heights. Only weighs 1.3lb, which is easy to travel with a carry bag. (Its max load capacity is 6.6lb, we do not recommend it for use with heavy and high-end equipment)

【3-Way Pan Head】Comes with a larger plate, which keeps more stable for your cameras than other tripods with a narrow plate. It allows for pan and tilt motion(90°/180°/360°), meeting any angle that the your needs.

【Widely Compatible】Leg braces and rubber feet make the position safe and sturdy in the wind, which plays an important part in your travel. With a standard 1/4" mount screw, the smartphone tripod is compatible with small cameras, projectors, mini ring lights, line lasers and etc. Perfect for selfies, video recording, and live streaming.

【Wireless Remote Control】The smartphone tripod with the accompanied Bluetooth shutter for iOS 6.0 or newer and Android 4.2.2 Phones, allows you to take selfies or group photos easily from a distance of up to 30 ft. No apps are needed to download, free your hands to record wonderful moments. (NOTE: the remote doesn't work with the camera)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ENGiDOT MLT01 Lightweight Smartphone Tripod - A Beginner Tripod It is everything you need from a tripod – compact, lightweight, durable, and flexible. It offers fantastic support and stability without being too heavy and difficult to carry. Bonus 360-degree phone clip adds more fun in daily life, and the phone clip adjusts between 2.04 - 3.5 inches, which is compatible with most phones. Wireless remote shutter allows you to take photos easily at distances up to 30 ft, Great for selfies, family portrait photos, parties, traveling hiking. You can use them EXTENSIVELY in all kinds of conditions.

Adjustable & Portable The smartphone tripod comes with 3-section high-quality aluminum alloy legs & quick release flip-locks, which can extend from 16" to 55" to meet your needs of different heights. And the universal 1/4" screw is included to support quickly installing the DSLR cameras. 3-Way Pan Head The smartphone tripod allows for pan and tilt motion(90°/180°/360°), meeting any angle that you need. Bluetooth Remote Control This smartphone tripod comes with a wireless remote shutter, enables you to take photos on iOS or Android phones at a distance of up to 30 feet afar. (Note: Your smartphone doesn't need to download any APP when you use the remote.)

Widely Compatible The smartphone tripod is great for selfies, family portrait photos. Free your hands to record your wonderful moments. The camera tripod is good for video recording such as parties, traveling, hiking. The lightweight tripod is suitable for lectures, classroom presentations, tournaments or landscape photographing, live streaming, etc. Standard 1/4" Camera Mounting Screw of the extendable tripod fits action camera, Go Pro, line laser and etc. The max load capacity is 6.6 lbs. Not recommended to use with large and heavy equipment.
Specifications Maximum Height 55" Minimum Height 16" Storage Length 16.7" Weight 1.3lbs Maximum Load Capacity 6.6lbs Bluetooth range 30ft

Basic Tripod Laser Level Model MLT01 SC-L01 leveling range / +-4 degree Accuracy / +-4.5mm/15m Power Source Button Cell Battery CR2032(3V) 2×˝AA˝ (LR6) Remote Shutter ✓ / Dimensions 17.32" x 3.86" x 3.82" 2.95" x 2.95" x 2.6" Weight 1.3 lbs ‎1.01 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: For under $14 I was not expecting it to be as nice as this. I am using this for recording RC truck videos dirt bike videos BMX videos Etc. Super simple to use all three poles are aluminum everything on the seams put together very nice and really good quality. Even comes in a nice little carrying bag. Would definitely recommend this. Can't wait to crank out some new videos for the YouTube channel highly recommend this product. Didn't even know it came with a little push button to start your camera or to take a picture that is super cool it links up to your phone looks like a little car key fob

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best $15 I’ve ever spent?
reviews.reviewText: Use this to film short videos at least once per week. Super stable. I’ve used a couple other with smaller bases. This is much more sturdy. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ive bought a few budget style tripods and they just didnt get the job done, too unstable. But this one was stable and a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this tripod! But it is a little flimsy due to material. Best for use with phone.
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is terrific to carry around just about anywhere. It is extremely lightweight and quick to setup. My only complaint is that it does not feel very sturdy with heavier items, such as DSLR cameras, but it does state a weight limit of 6.6lbs. Additionally, it feels like it is made of plastic, and I believe the reason for this is to maintain being very lightweight. I do admit to having been able to use my DSLR on it plenty of times, so I can confirm that it works. However, I am always making sure to have the camera strap on me in case the tripod does break or topple over. DSLRs aside, this is a TERRIFIC overall tripod. It is great for a wide variety of things such as holding an extra set of lights, holding a phone, holding reflectors, and holding action cameras. I have used it plenty of times and even purchased another one because I like it so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to put a small projector on for movies at the barn/pond! I wanted one that had long legs all the way up for more stability (we always have lots of kids running around and I was worried with the three legged ones only at the bottom they would tip it over) this one definitely delivers! It comes with a phone holder that comes off as well and the remote works great for my little to take selfies with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Shakes from the slightest breathe and is only a couple feet tall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very lightweight but not the most sturdy, but that's what you get with lightweight stuff, it's usually one or the other. I still think this is a good purchase, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is light weight yet sturdy. Great value for the money. Love the included carrying case and how it folds up so easily.
